0.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are currently facing technical issues on our McDelivery online system and app. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery online and app orders during this period. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime as we look into resolving the issue. In the meantime, you may place your orders via our McDelivery hotline 6777 3777. Thank you.

comments.message: Terrible, burger soaked in sauce and too salty. Nothing close to Korean except that it's spicy ..... it's quite a let down unfortunately
McDonlad's, I demand to change the burger's name to 'Pyongyang spicy burger' because this burger taste so bad that i felt like there was a chain nuclear fission in on my tongue.

I tried spicy chicken burger today and very disappointed. I realised they used grilled McChicken marinated with smoke flavour which makes spicy sauce taste very salty and non-authentic. It makes the burger even bitter. It would be nicer if they used very lightly salted chicken instead. For Kimchi shaker fries, it taste better than seaweed shaker but still truffle shaker is the best.

At least have the common courtesy and service knowledge to call your customers who have ordered and inform them that you have been unable to process their orders. Posting on your facebook does not inform the majority of your customers. HORRIBLE SERVICE.

Ordered my food at 12am, estimated delivery time was 70mins. It is now 2.37am and my food has not arrived. Called customer service and they said they will get downtown east manager to call me but they have not called. Called back customer service again and they told me that they have a system failure and i have to reorder even after I have already paid for my food? Did not even bother to inform me that my order was not processed and made me wait for 2 hours and now they tell me I have to order and wait again? Horrible service, $4 delivery charge? Yeah right, not even worth it.
Need free burgers to compensate.

7.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are currently facing technical issues on our McDelivery system. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders during this period. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us as we look into resolving the issue. Thank you.

comments.message: Why is the bbq beef burger stated as "will be back soon"?

went to sun plaza McDonald's restaurant last sat 18 feb, wanted to order value meal of new BBQ beef with egg for my son to try it, yet to disappointment, a male supervisor that took my order,  just gave me an ambiguous response that it wasn't available, n suggested to change my order!! I asked him when would it be available, 15 mins, or half an hour, n he just kept telling me not available! the time i ordered was only about 6pm!  I went to ask a counter staff, she told me was sold out due to overwhelming response. I believe she could give me a concrete reply rather than that supervisor!

Went to the suntec branch on 10th Jan. The manager was the one filling up the fries at 6.25pm and she did it lazily and only filling 60% of the all fries holders.

Once I got mine, i asked her to fill it until the holder is full. She looked at me very rudely and unapologetically and then deliberately only added 3 pcs of fries to piss me off. It was the manager in black uniform, who is a female (she has earstuds) but looks masculine with a short hair.

Also, the classic cheese angus beef had an undercooked patty. The meat was dripping pink liquid and looks pinkish inside and feels mushy.

Please ensure disciplinary actions are taken. Do you give customer service training at all to ur managers?

You promised to call me through fb but never did.

9.post_text:
McCafé® Toffee Nut Latte and Crunchy Toffee Nut Frappe are back by popular demand!

Take a break from the hustle and bustle with Espresso blended with milk and toffee nut syrup, topped with a swirl of cream & crushed cone with the Frappe or enjoy the latte which is drizzled with Caramel syrup. 

Available from now to 12 April 2017, while stocks last.

Went to the suntec branch on 10th Jan. The manager was the one filling up the fries at 6.25pm and she did it lazily and only filling 60% of the all fries holders.

Once I got mine, i asked her to fill it until the holder is full. She looked at me very rudely and unapologetically and then deliberately only added 3 pcs of fries to piss me off. It was the manager in black uniform, who is a female (she has earstuds) but looks masculine with a short hair.

Also, the classic cheese angus beef had an undercooked patty. The meat was dripping pink liquid and looks pinkish inside and feels mushy.

Unsure, but i would surely prefer to buy from my neighborhood Do&Me self-operated store than it's big rival, even Do&Me foodstuff maybe not as "delicious" as McD's. Good Afternoon McDonald's! was a little bit disappointed by the service this afternoon. Ordered some meals for my family, and when the order came, one Golden Prosperity Beef Burger was missing, upon calling the hotline, they immediately offered to have one sent over, which arrived in about 15 minutes. 

However, after it arrived, it turned out to be a Chicken Prosperity burger, wrong meat, no hash brown. Upon calling the hotline, they offered to have the manager call me back, and the explanation provided was, there were no hash browns left, period. no offer to try and solve the problem, or apologies for my having paid for a more expensive burger.

A little disappointing McDonald's!

Just now me and my Daughter and Son we eat our lunch  to McDonald's Bedok North (opposite Shieng Shiong) this place is our Family fav place, but not now anymore! After we eat our meal I ask my daughter to take tissue to the counter, and I'm sitting opposite to the counter so it's means I can see her (daughter), the cashier taking order to the customer while my kid at side asking for a tissue and the cashier reply " yes I will going to give you a tissue but use your manners!" And when I look at my kid she look like scared , when she back to our table my daughter shows  me a scared face while saying "Mama the lady told me to use my manners" 
I can hear she talk to my kid but not really clear. After that I Q to her when I'm infront of her I told that next time don't say that again to my kid or even to other kids, she reply because she cannot wait I'm taking order  and I told her working this kind of line you must have a little bit patience as most of the customer are kids! to think that my Daughter only 6yrs old and she's not rude while she's asking for a tissue! When the manager come to her( cashier), the manager just laugh with the cashier like insulting me! I'm super upset and disappointed! Some of the aunties cashier there are very friendly they know us already as we mostly eat there Everyday. Unlike this lady she's unreasonable person! As aMother I feel offended and Sad�

20.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance and upgrading works on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0630 hours on 18 January 2017. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants during this time. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

22.post_text: Make blessings yummier with these red packets, featuring McDonald’s® all-time favourites. Free set of six with every purchase of a Golden Prosperity Extra Value Meal™ at all participating McDonald’s® restaurants and via McDelivery® from 12 January 2017, on a while stocks last basis. Designs vary for restaurants (French Fries, Big Mac® and Strawberry Sundae designs) and McDelivery® (French Fries, Big Mac® and McCafé®).

comments.message: Hash brown should given to customer individually ... Should not put inside the burger .. The sauce just makes the hashbrown not look like a hashbrown ... Crispy is not there anymore ...
If buy this golden meal, will get the limited angbao

Was looking forward to eating this especially when I heard some radio deejays making it sound so good. Turns out to be just like any other McDonald's promotional burgers. Extremely boring. Taste is insipid. All one can taste is the pepper sauce which isn't even a delectable flavour. No point having hash browns if you can't even detect it.

You guys need to train your staff better. I specifically ordered the Golden Prosperity Burger special meal and even point to the small advert on your POS to your counter staff but my order came with the normal fries and not the twister fries. Upon asking the staff preparing the orders collection, I was told I need to tell the counter crew specifically that I want twister fries. Funny. The name of the meal on the adverts that shows the burger, TWISTER FRIES and a drink is stated as "Golden Prosperity Special". Why do I need to specify again that I want twister fries? The picture is not even showing normal fries? Do I need to specify that the Prosperity burger needs to come with Two buns, a beef patty, the black pepper sauce and onions too?
Macs running out of ideas..

McDonald's pls update on the McDelivery page that the beef burger is spicy. The staff should properly update the website with the 'spicy' logo as shown on some other food item. 

McD's main website shows the description of the burger, but when doing an online order, one will not refer to the main website. 

Thanks!

Went to the suntec branch on 10th Jan. The manager was the one filling up the fries at 6.25pm and she did it lazily and only filling 60% of the all fries holders.

Once I got mine, i asked her to fill it until the holder is full. She looked at me very rudely and unapologetically and then deliberately only added 3 pcs of fries to piss me off. It was the manager in black uniform, who is a female (she has earstuds) but looks masculine with a short hair.

Also, the classic cheese angus beef had an undercooked patty. The meat was dripping pink liquid and looks pinkish inside and feels mushy.

Please ensure disciplinary actions are taken. Do you give customer service training at all to ur managers?
ordered a prosperity beef burger meal but found out that there was a hash brown inside instead. this shouldn't be the case right - the one with a hash brown is a "GOLDEN prosperity beef burger"?

Eaten half. But honestly could be improved. Ordered at Admiralty outlet, the black pepper sauce was overflowing n a little messy. Main thing is, it's a little too much for me to taste the chicken or hash brown. I feel like I'm eating black pepper burger instead. 🤔
Bought two prosperity chicken burger from cwp. Advertisements and photos here gave hash brown in the burger. But for both the burgers that I bought have no hash brown at all. Feel so cheated. 😠
This addition of hashbrown is dumb! The black pepper sauce will make the hashbrown soggy!! One more complaint, can you dilute the black pepper sauce, it's too concentrated!!
Yongming Loke hash brown !! What are you waiting for ?
